de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors

Class SensorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.sensors.SensorHandler

  • public class SensorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle instantiation and storage of sensor classes, as well as temporarily disabling them. Uses reflection to find classes for the different SensorType values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.content.Context mContext
      Context stored for android interaction purposes
      private DataSink mDataSink
      The data sink given to every sensor.
      private java.util.EnumMap<SensorType,AbstractSensor> mSensors
      This map stores already instantiated sensor classes
      private boolean mSensorsSuspended
      True if the sensors are all (possibly temporarily) unregistered
      private java.util.EnumMap<SensorType,java.lang.Boolean> mTemporarySensorActivationList
      The list of sensor activations.

      • setRunning

        public void setRunning(java.util.List<SensorType> requiredSensors)
                throws SensorNotFoundException
        Set the list of sensors that should run
        Parameters:
        requiredSensors - the sensors that must run
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if a sensor is not found in the current device

                              SetSensorSpeed.SensorSpeed sensorSpeed)
        Update the sensor speed for a given sensor
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the sensor type that should change its speed
        sensorSpeed - the speed the sensor should switch to
        Returns:
        true if the setting succeeded

        Parameters:
        requiredSensors - list of required sensors
        Returns:
        the mapping

      • applySensorActivationList

        private void applySensorActivationList(java.util.EnumMap<SensorType,java.lang.Boolean> activationList)
                                throws SensorNotFoundException
        Apply each sensor state from a sensor activation list
        Parameters:
        activationList - a mapping from sensor type to its required activation state
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if a sensor could not be instantiated

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(SensorType sensor)
        Get the registration/activation state of a sensor
        Parameters:
        sensor - the sensor
        Returns:
        true if the sensor is currently required

      • setSensor

        private void setSensor(SensorType sensorType,
                       boolean enable)
                throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method tries to dis- or enable a certain sensor.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the list of required sensors
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if the sensor could not be instantiated

      • temporarilySetSensors

        public void temporarilySetSensors(boolean enable)
        Wrapper function for wakeUpSensors() and suspendSensors().
        Parameters:
        enable - true if the sensors should be enabled

      • wakeUpSensors

        public void wakeUpSensors()
        Re-enable the sensors that were previously temporarily disabled using suspendSensors()

      • suspendSensors

        public void suspendSensors()
        Save the sensor activation state, and temporarily disable all of them, until they are activated again with wakeUpSensors()

      • getSensor

        private AbstractSensor getSensor(SensorType sensorType)
                          throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                 java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                 java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Retrieve a sensor. If it is not yet instantiated, return a new instance.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the sensor type to be initiated
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the sensor could not be instantiated
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the sensor could not be instantiated
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the sensor could not be instantiated
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the sensor could not be instantiated
        java.io.IOException - if the sensor could not be started
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if no sensor class with a name matching the enum value could be found

      • getRange

        public float getRange(SensorType sensorType)
               throws SensorNotFoundException
        Get the range of a sensor as reported by android
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the sensor type of which we range is requested
        Returns:
        range of the sensor as given by android
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if the sensor is not available in this device

      • getClass

        private java.lang.Class getClass(SensorType sensorType)
                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Get a Class for a sensor type
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the sensor type we need
        Returns:
        a Class instance corresponding to the given sensor type
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sensor could not be found. This indicates a sensor type that is not in the correct package, or does not have the same name as in the enum

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        Close all sensors (unregister them)
